lead_paragraph: The first in a series of concerts devoted to the Austrian composer included a piece that evoked the excruciating pain of a flaying.

headline.print_headline: The Sensation of Being Flayed, With Sawing, Screeching Chords
headline.main: Review: In ‘American Immersion: Clemens Gadenstätter,’ Sonic Mortification

snippet: The first in a series of concerts devoted to the Austrian composer included a piece that evoked the excruciating pain of a flaying.
abstract: Zachary Woolfe reviews concert of contemporary classical works by Austrian composer Clemens Gadenstatter, performed by Talea Ensemble and JACK Quartet at Austrian Cultural Forum.
